editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 damage to each champion.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever non-combat damage is dealt to one or more units by a fire element source you control, put a **quest** counter on your champion.

[REST]: You may remove seven **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.
editions.effect_raw:
Immortality, Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 damage to each champion.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever non-combat damage is dealt to one or more units by a fire element source you control, put a quest counter on your champion.

REST: You may remove seven quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Ruby Fatestone.

other_orientations.effect:
**Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] **On Banish**: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, return CARDNAME to the field transformed. *(It enters as Suzaku, Vermillion Phoenix.)*
other_orientations.effect_raw:
Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] On Banish: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, return Suzaku to the field transformed. (It enters as Suzaku, Vermillion Phoenix.)
other_orientations.name: Suzaku, Vermillion Phoenix
other_orientations.effect_html: SpellshroudGuo Jia Bonus On Banish: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, return Suzaku to the field transformed. (It enters as Suzaku, Vermillion Phoenix.)

If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Ruby Fatestone.

rule.description: If a transformed double-faced object would enter the graveyard from the field, it goes to the default location that the front would go. In this case, a regalia goes to its owner's banishment.
